SELECT * FROM (SELECT u.USER_ID "user_id", u.EMAIL "email", u.NAME "name", u.PHOTO "photo", u.STATUS "status", u.LAT "lat", u.LON "lon", u.TIMEZONE "time_zone", f.FEED_ID "feed_id", f.CONTENT "content", f.PHOTO "fphoto", f.REG_DATE "reg_date", f.TAGS "tags", f.WRITE_LAN "write_lan", d.ORIGINAL_NAME, d.UUID "uuid", d.DIRECTORY, p.DELETE_YN "delete_yn", nvl(likeCnt.LIKECNT,0) "like_cnt", F_COMMENT_CNT(f.feed_id) "cmt" FROM feed f JOIN users u ON f.USER_ID = u.USER_ID left outer join photo p on f.PHOTO = p.PHOTO_ID left outer join photo_detail d on p.PHOTO_ID= d.PHOTO_ID left outer join feedLikeCnt_v likeCnt on f.FEED_ID = likeCnt.FEED_ID WHERE u.user_id=#{user_id} ORDER BY f.REG_DATE DESC)
